## InternalCustom type

Internal representation of Custom Type that exposes the `data` property. Used at buildtime.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export type InternalCustom<B extends CustomOperationBrand = any> = CustomOperation<any, never, B> & {
    data: InternalCustomData;
};
```
